entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Release/6.0] HostActivationTest has been crashing on macOS #61636
    6.0.x
  • Improve HostBuilder and WebApplicationBuilder ServiceCollection integration #61635
    7.0.0
  • Improve HostBuilder and WebApplicationBuilder Configuration integration #61634
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'node->OperIs(GT_ADD, GT_SUB)' in 'Matrix:GetHashCode():int:this' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' (IL size 96) #61629
  • GC slowdown from .NET Core 3.1 #61628
    6.0.x
  • [Mono][Perf][Wasm] Regression across many collection related benchmarks #61624
  • [Mono][Perf][AOT] Regressions in BigInteger benchmarks. #61623
  • JIT: Optimize *x = dblCns to *x = intCns for arm64 #61620
    Future
  • Don't fail superpmi replay job if the only problem is MISSING data #61616
    7.0.0
  • "dotnet-pgo dump" throws "Same type `X` used as both ValueType and non-ValueType" #61604
    7.0.0
  • Assert: src/mono/mono/metadata/class-setup-vtable.c:1747, condition `<disabled>' not met #61603
  • System.Text.Json 6.0.0 package breaks builds with .Net SDK 3.1 #61602
  • Cannot pass byte pointer to array from rust runtime to wasm: TypeError: Buffer is already detached #61600
    7.0.0
  • NET6 - Stopwatch.ElapsedMilliseconds returns wrong result when using monoVM on linux-arm #61599
  • NET6 - Wrong DateTime.ToString() formating when using monoVM and linux-arm #61598
    6.0.x
  • Add runtime-full pipeline to replace CI/non-CI split #61588
  • ReadyToRun build does not work on Windows 10 - no crash, just 0xC0000602 #61584
  • Very high CPU usage during NullReferenceException translation phase #61583
  • Normalize crash buckets between .NET Core and .NET Framework #61580
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Interop\\PInvoke\\Vector2_3_4\\Vector2_3_4\\Vector2_3_4.cmd #61579
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.Dsa.Tests.DsaArrayOffsetSignatureFormatTests.BadSignatureFormat #61578

Closed

  • Translation vector of Transformation matrix works incorrect when PageUnit is Point. #25122
    Future
  • Use Span<Char>.Fill in String(Char, Int32) constructor #57993
    7.0.0
  • Introduce pause intrinsics in order to support spin wait loop indication #53532
    Future
  • Windows ARM64 CoreCLR runtime tests are failing in CI with empty logs #61548
  • Cannot change LastWriteTime or LastAccessTime of a symlink #38824
    Future
  • Action<> delegate has a wrong Nullable-Reflect-Infomation in different .NET versions. #61586
  • Tasks required for servicing 6.0.1 #59533
    6.0.0
  • JIT optimization breaks pointer/ref arithmetic #61510
    7.0.0
  • Create Codespaces Prebuild workflow fails on forks of this repository #61250
    7.0.0
  • .NET 6 C++/CLI runtime generates InvalidProgramException when large stack-allocated variables are used #60852
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose a JsonSerializerOptions.Default property #61093
    7.0.0
  • SocketException: An existing connection was forcibly closed by the remote host. .net core #57895
    7.0.0
  • [CodeDom] Empty lines are indented #30761
    Future
  • System.Linq MaxBy and MinBy call eagerly the keySelector function. #61556
  • Enabled AOT blazor Wasm Precompilation fails. #61565

PullRequests

Created

  • Use GeneratedDllImport for blittable p/invokes in System.IO.Compression, System.IO.Compression.Brotli, System.Net.Http, System.Net.NameResolution #61638
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Add ThrowIfNull overload for pointers #61633
    new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Only run JIT formatting job if there are JIT changes #61632
  • Use static abstract interface methods in SymbolicRegexMatcher #61631
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm] Unify some code #61630
  • [mono][aot] Fix the inclusion of generic instances when doing profile… #61627
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add [Fact] attributes to all remaining ilproj tests #61625
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • HostFactoryResolver - Increase default timeout to one minute #61621
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Stabilize upgrade code and dependency key for host msi #61619
    Servicing-consider, area-Setup
  • [arm64] JIT: Make 0.0 containable for fcmp #61617
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • update the last stable version and validation check #61615
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Provide locations for src-gen diagnostic output #61614
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Fix handing of native types #61612
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add a JsonWriterOptions.MaxDepth property #61608
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [source-build][mono] Do not build Microsoft.NET.Runtime.MonoTargets.Sdk #61607
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Stabilize upgrade codes for host msi #61606
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/6.0] Disable poisoning for large structs #61601
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Upload checked JITs for Release branches and introduce jitmap.txt #61597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] renames and cleanup before modularization #61596
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • [DRAFT][private] Fix xunit xharness fails #61595
    arch-wasm
  • [wasm] Reduce the output from tests. #61593
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Fix parsing of ping error replies on raw sockets #61592
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [wasm] [debugger] Eval fixes for static class eval #61591
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Enable DD117522 test #61585
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [wasm] build improvements, and fixes #61581
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Merged

  • Allow for backport to report progress to PR #61637
  • Give write access to backport action explicitly #61626
  • Restrict GITHUB_TOKEN in markdownlint action #61622
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix race condition with cancellation tokens in Read/Flush operations … #61500
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Use GeneratedDllImport in Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents #61609
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Create runtime staging clone to manually kick off full test runs #61443
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable SymbolicRegexNode.IsNullableFor fast path to inline #61605
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Delete `impCheckForNullPointer` #61576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Alternative fix of #60182 #60298
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [wasm] parallel asset loading #61610
    7.0.0
  • Adding support for X86Base.Pause() and ArmBase.Yield() #61065
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Exclude the managed code around libproc on iOS/tvOS #61590
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-ios
  • Loop refactoring and commenting improvements #61496
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `__DoCrossgen2` #61582
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Rewrite selection for fields and always normalize SIMD types in VN #61370
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Delete dead code #61533
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • There shouldn't be a 'lib' prefix on Windows .lib files #61618
    os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • Use Span.Fill in String(Char, Int32) constructor #60269
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/5.0] Credscan addition to #61371 #61511
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net
  • Fix LastWriteTime and LastAccessTime of a symlink on Windows and Unix #52639
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Improve System.Speech trimmability #61566
    linkable-framework, area-System.Speech, community-contribution
  • Fix CharInClass reference in regex emitter #61559
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Update workflow docs to indicate ARM64 macOS works #61575
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • FileSystem.Unix: improve CopyFile. #59695
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Use GeneratedDllImport for blittable p/invokes in System.Diagnostics.Process, System.Diagnostics.Process, System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo, System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeInformation #61532
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Remove the "anything + null => null" optimization #61518
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SortedList<TKey, TValue> added GetKeyAtIndex, GetValueAtIndex, and SetValueAtIndex #60520
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Disable poisoning for large structs #61589
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add JsonSerializerOptions.Default #61434
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix UnobservedTaskException from SemaphoreSlim.WaitAsync #61491
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 6.0.x

Updated

  • [wasm][debugger] Fix evaluation of a static class attribute; using current namespace for evaluation #61252
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Merge System.Security.Cryptography.Algorithms to System.Security.Cryptography #61543
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add tests for CNG key algorithm mismatches #61211
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Factor out and improve the vectorization of RegexInterpreter.FindFirstChar #61490
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1470658 #61274
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • make System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates compliant with interop guidelines - part 3 #61435
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Obsolete thumbtacked AssemblyName properties #59522
    area-System.Reflection, breaking-change, community-contribution
  • Add 'w' and 's' bit to xarch instruction flags. #61198
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • FileStatus.Unix/Process.Unix: align caching of user identity. #60160
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • CreateDirectory: eliminate some syscalls. #58799
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • FileSystem.Unix: Directory.Delete: remove per item syscall. #59520
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Extend RegexCharClass.Canonicalize range inversion optimization #61562
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Make more extensive use of lvaGetDesc() #61494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: don't import IL for partial compilation blocks #61572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert TryGetRawMetadata comment to XML documentation #61515
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Rework memory stream management #61392
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Optimize DateTimeOffset #58169
    area-System.Runtime, needs more info, community-contribution
  • POC src/tests tree test xunit-based source generated runner #60846
    area-Infrastructure
  • Optimize `StringBuilder` by embracing spans and `ISpanFormattable` more. #58907
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • throw exception when creating an entry name that already exists in ZipArchive #60973
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Vectorize SpanHelpers<T>.IndexOf #60974
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • XArch: Trim the code block to match the actual code length #61523
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [HTTP] Scavange fix #61530
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Handle empty string parameter value in MetadataLoadContext #61457
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • WIP: Initial implementation of the ILPROJ analyzer utility to assist the planned runtime test refactoring #60984
  • Provide locations for src-gen diagnostic output #61430
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Update `GetPinnableReference()` usage in multi-step custom type marshalling #61539
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Add RIDs for MIRACLE LINUX 8 #61304
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Improvement of memory consumption while Evaluating Expressions #61470
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Added AsReadOnly extension methods for IDictionary<T, U> and IList<T> #61172
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [Wasm] JS modularization #61313
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] 1388 xml serializer assembly load context awareness #61266
    Servicing-consider, area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • Fixing update issue with multivalued properties #34267 #56696
    area-System.DirectoryServices, blocked, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • CI matrix change: add Windows Server 2022 #60163
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Exclude ref .cs files from .editorconfig formatting #60424
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix issue #60543 #60544
    area-System.Xml
  • Don't special case "Experimental" projects #60641
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix invalid behavior of MoveToAttribute methods #60556
    area-System.Xml
  • Update .NET SDK to the .NET 6.0 RTM SDK #61472
    area-Infrastructure
  • Refactoring XmlConvert #60285
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Fix WinMD handling in System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext #58344
    area-System.Reflection, needs more info, community-contribution
  • Use generic math in System.Numerics.Vectors (#60365) #60905
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • S.IO.StringReader: Use ReadOnlySpan.IndexOfAny in ReadLine() for performance #60463
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Implement PEM exports for RSA PKCS#1 and ECPrivateKey #61487
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • FileSystemEntry.Unix: ensure properties are available when file is deleted. #60214
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Search native code in all R2R ni.dll in version bubble #57277
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Minor File.ReadAllBytes* improvements #61519
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Support Process.Start() on MacCatalyst #61507
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • [Mono] Fix support for nested structs with explicit layout #61467
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] View multidimensional array when debugging #60983
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Issue 55685 processname optimisation #59672
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Fix poisoning for very large structs #61521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add nested static attribute support. #61508
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [arm64] JIT: Add with sign/zero extend #61549
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix perf issues discovered in "For software performance, can you always trust inlining" blog #61408
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Allow runtimeconfig StartupHooks and Environment StartupHooks to both be present #61461
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Run AOT, and Wasm.Build.Tests on windows #59479
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, Future
  • Hide 'align' instruction behind jmp #60787
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Windows Forms] Controls support #1100

PullRequests

Created

Merged

  • Add CompatibilityPackages experiement #1726

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Support for more unary and binary ops #1705

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • win11-rids not present #22597

Closed

  • `workload install android` fails on Ubuntu (works on Win/Mac) #22411
    Discussion
  • Nuget command fails when building a .NET 6 image on a Raspberry Pi 4 #22587

PullRequests

Merged

  • Cherry-pick #22180 #22613

Updated

  • Tell user when workload has already been installed #22557
    Area-Workloads
  • Do not advertise workload updates on run output #22573
    Area-Workloads
  • Ensure references added using "Reference" are correctly copied in BlazorWASM projects #22542
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • Blazor AOT Publish Tests #22477
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-AspNetCore
  • Switch the non-windows test builds to also run helix and non-helix in parallel. #22284
    Area-Infrastructure

Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Raw string literal #4304

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Introduce parameter is replacing one file with another file's contents #57781
  • Consider inferring from the function type of a lambda expression that returns a lambda or method group #57779
  • new() not respecting nullable struct #57777
  • VisualStudio 2019 'UseSimpleUsingStatementCodeFixProvider' encountered an error and has been disabled. #57771
  • CSharpAddBracesCodeFixProvider Exception with Visual Studio 2022 #57770
  • ReplaceMethodWithPropertyCodeRefactoringProvider encountered an error and has been disabled #57769
  • VS2022 Release: Blazor code behind class wrong parenthesis refactoring in C# compiler directive #57768
  • "Name can be simplified" refactoring results in invalid code (build error) #57767
  • IDE0049 should use dotnet_style_predefined_type_for_locals_parameters_members for parameter types in XMLDoc references #57764
  • VS crahses on typing a new type constraint in complex generic code #57763
  • VS crashes on pasting a specific code snippet into it #57762
  • Method inference issue with extension methods that have lamdas as argument when the class implementation contains a method overload with object argument. #57759
  • Add fix for value conversion for known types #57758

Closed

  • While applying lifting for operators involving ref structs, compiler can silently construct invalid Nullable types. #56646
    17.1
  • Completion for static members incorrectly references nullable static type. #57636
    17.1
  • Re-enable test CommandLineTests.ReservedDeviceNameAsFileName #55730
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't throw exceptions for file changes after a project is unloaded #57782
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for nullable analysis in interpolated string handler constructors #57780
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix null ref in navbars #57778
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure that getting the checksum for a project cone is resilient to its project references being missing #57776
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57775
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57774
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Simplify code for producing project-id list #57772
    Area-IDE
  • Load SVsShellDebugger before calling IVsSolution.CreateSolution #57765
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Check constraints on lifted operator types #57050
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix C# language name in spec #57427
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #57773
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #57716
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Don't show nullable annotation in completion items of static field/property #57744
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Adjust tests for Windows 11 changes #57678
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57740
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #57756
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Ignore function types in return type inference #57713
    Area-Compilers, Needs Shiproom Approval, 17.0
  • Allow xml docs to still be created when 'emit metadata only' is on. #57667
    Area-Compilers
  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix curly brace and interpolated string #57751
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [hackathon] Support nice syntax for ValueArray in most type contexts. #57286
    Area-Compilers
  • Shorten paths in VS installation #57726
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update stream jsonrpc version to enable workspace diagnostics #57703
    Area-IDE
  • Address some PROTOTYPE markers #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Add new parser/lexer to the StackTraceAnalyzer #57598
    Area-IDE
  • Handle Array/Collection initializers case for implicit object creation analyzer #57679
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add test from PR 50799 for impl PR 56853 #57752
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Include a type for NoneOperations in VB, print the type in tests #57664
    Area-Compilers
  • Move Default VB Version to 16.9 #57688
    Area-Compilers
  • Simplify implementation of SourceGeneratedFileItemSource #57691
    Area-IDE
  • Update corefx dependencies to 6.0.0 #57732
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable dumps for hung tests #57549
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Port BasicNavigationBar.CodeSpit to the new test harness #57738
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Peek definition shows definition from .razor.g.cs instead of just .razor file #38415
  • Blazor WebAssembly doesn't load symbols for debugging #38413
  • Add IIS Express launch profile for gRPC templates #38405
  • Startup regression: caching #38404
  • (Blazor) Append boolean to LocationChangedEventArgs indicating whether the navigation came from NavigationManager #38402
  • Investigate not requiring unintuitive requirements for pre-rendering PageTitle #38400
  • Visual Studio 2022 Couldn't start the SPA development server with command 'npm start' #38398
  • Blazor Wasm Hosted Project : API Call not working, Returns Index.html for all API Calls #38396
  • dotnet run --project ignores launchsettings #38397
  • Conditionally pass renderfragments to components #38393
    Next sprint planning
  • Perf improvement: json_netty #38391

Closed

  • Blazor: RefreshDataAsync downloads data but does not show them #31231
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Blazor Server OnInitialized called after setting variable when run under VS2022 but not in VS2019 #38130
    Discussions
  • System.NullReferenceException while HttpContextAccessor.HttpContext?.TraceIdentifier #37921
  • InputBase does not update FieldIdentifier when a new ValueExpression is set #38288
    Discussions
  • Attribute based routing is not "area aware" #30333
    Discussions
  • project Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Razor build fail #38028
  • VS2022 RC2 Building Blazor error reporting not working well #38072
  • Some SignInManagerTests are commented out #38129
    7.0-alpha1
  • POSTing array into an "object" action parameter does not work #38383
  • Upgrading app to .Net 6 Shows multiple app errors under browser console #38215
  • Blazor Binding to multiple instances of a nested component causes bindings to mix up #38089
  • Blazor ValidationMessage issue when using custom validation attributes #38258
  • BUG: Reopen #38192 #38282
  • Base Exception: Exception of type 'System.OutOfMemoryException' was thrown #38389
  • Reduce E2E test dependencies #27610
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Remove E2EMigrationTests Playwright Tests #37929
    7.0-alpha1
  • CSS Isolation not works for Img elements #38376
  • How to solve "Invalid Emulator component" issue in Mobile Blazor Bindings #38379
  • Context.User.Identity.IsAuthenticated is always false in signalr? #38386
  • Windows.Storage & Windows.Web.Http unavailable after upgrade to .net6 #38390

PullRequests

Created

  • Update yarn.lock #38418
    area-blazor
  • Update SDK to 7.0.100-alpha.1.21558.2 #38417
    area-infrastructure
  • Upgrade Playwright #38414
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/3.1] Use googletest's new 'main' branch #38412
    3.1.x
  • Use googletest's new 'main' branch #38409
  • Let VS Code do its thing #38388
    area-infrastructure
  • Override base implementation of WriteLineAsync(string) in HttpResponseStreamWriter #38387
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/5.0] Use googletest's new 'main' branch #38411
    5.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Use googletest's new 'main' branch #38410
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.1
  • Remove set-value #38406
    area-blazor
  • Bump the Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk version #38403
    area-infrastructure
  • Verify DI trimming in unit tests #38142
    area-infrastructure
  • Clean up signinmanager tests #38399
    area-identity
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `bf0701d` to `1b18723` #38392
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-alpha1
  • Remove Blazor Playwright Component E2E Tests in E2ETestMigration #38344
    area-blazor, 7.0-alpha1

Updated

  • Antiforgery middleware #38314
    area-runtime
  • Verify Roslyn compiler changes #38362
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *, 6.0.x
  • Use window.document for React-Native #38340
    area-signalr
  • Create ReleasePlanning.md #37940
    Docs, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • DiagnosticsClient.AttachProfiler fails to serialize additionalData. #2741
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow for stable-versions to go to nightly feed for tools #2752

Merged

  • Add byte[] to SerializePayloadArgument #2748
    Microsoft.Diagnostics.NETCore.Client

Updated

  • Fix parse dotnet trace providers option #2730

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug] Windows desktop application only runs in Visual Studio #3402
  • [Enhancement] Need origin for maui view transform (Scale, Rotation) #3398
  • [Bug] Dynamic time allotted size not reflect in maui view #3397
  • WebRTC + MAUI #3394
  • MAUI + Azure Communication Services #3393
  • Use Microsoft Edge HTML/CSS renderer as self-contained in Blazor MAUI apps #3390
  • [Bug] Java.Interop version issue in Android #3389

Closed

  • [Bug] OnChildAdded is not getting called when a child is added to a layout control #3229
  • [Bug] DatePicker not working as expected in Android #1940
  • Consider changing the names of the native app base types (MauiWinUIApplication, MauiApplication, MauiUIApplicationDelegate) #2242
    .NET 7
  • [Bug] WinUI fails to navigate to second page if the page is pushed onto the navigation stack before rendering #3193
  • [Bug] Navigation Page as Wrapper does not work #3058

PullRequests

Created

  • [Core,Controls] Remove legacy Log and use ILogger #3401
  • [Android] Fix crash using SearchHandler on Shell #3399
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢
  • [Core] Implement BackgroundImageSource in PageHandler #3396
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] Fix crash typing in Editor #3392
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • [Core] Implement IsReadOnly property in SearchBar #3391
    area/controls 🎮

Merged

  • Ensure new layouts are calling Element.OnChildAdded/Removed #3403
  • [Android,Windows] Add VerticalTextAligment to Editor #2723
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Fix mismatch date issue in DatePicker #3298
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • Validate and Fix MAUI Navigation Pages against our legacy tests #3329
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3373
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Introduce IVisualDiagnosticsOverlay #3351
    partner/ui-tools
  • [Wip] Maui 395 port editor autosize to handler #1202
    do-not-merge
  • Use the default Button styles #3363
  • Move `IDispatcher` logic out of `IPlatformServices` #2862
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Improvements Droid Lifecycle #2669
    area/lifecycle 🔁
  • Update template so you can find it under Windows as well #2484
    area/templates 📄
  • [Core] Rename XXXServiceProviders to XXXFactories #3368
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Update issue templates to use GitHub forms (beta) #3320
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [WiP] Fix Scoping of MauiContext as it relates to Modal Pages #3361
    do-not-merge
  • [android] reduce JNI calls by moving logic into Java #3372

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Issues with publishing and Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design.dll #26694
  • [6.0][CosmosDB] DateTime with z suffix is not respected when reading entities. #26690
  • dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold doesn't respect -d option #26687
  • InMemory provider in EF Core 6 doesn't set value for Timestamp-fields #26686
  • ToSqlQuery method not working in 6.0.0 #26685
  • Translating this query requires the SQL APPLY operation, which is not supported on SQLite. #26684
  • Could not install package 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer 6.0.0'. You are trying to install this package into a project that targets '.NETFramework,Version=v4.7.2', but the package does not contain any assembly references or content files that are compatible with that framework. For more information, contact the package author. #26683

Closed

  • Why is EFCore6 throwing NullReferenceException when adding entity/entities? It is working in EFCore5. #26644
  • Error in dotnet ef migrations add IdentityMigrations #26681
  • SqliteConnectionFactory.cs is not thread-safe #26612
  • update from 5.0.1 to 6.0breaks all SqliteConnection #26574
    6.0.x
  • Variable names must be unique within a query batch or stored procedure #26632
    6.0.x
  • Query with n:m relation adds non-existent column #26590
    6.0.x
  • Using Cosmos Db with EfCore and Managed Identity #26573
  • Use EqualsExact in DefaultDateTimeOffsetValueComparer #26672
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26698
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.22.1 to 3.23.0 #26693
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.0.3 to 8.0.4 #26692
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [Release/5.0]Fix ValueGenerated, make ValueGeneratedOnUpdate() and ValueGeneratedOnAddOrUpdate() working #26691
  • Additional tests for Temporal tables #26682
  • Fix some markdown language syntax highlights #26680

Merged

  • [6.0.x] Query: Update table references in pushdown after moving table referen… #26700
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.1
  • [6.0.1] Avoid infinite loop when finding principal in circular relationships #26699
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.1
  • [6.0.1] Use read-write lock to protect concurrent pool accesses (#26658) #26697
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26695
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [6.0.1] Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Handle more nulls in ApplicationDataHelper #26637
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.1
  • Use a unique identifier for variables during insert #26679
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.1
  • [6.0.1] Use read-write lock to protect SQLite concurrent pool accesses #26658
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
  • Revert SQLite concurrent pool access change #26696
  • Match indexer properties correctly #26645
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.x
  • Use EqualsExact in DefaultDateTimeOffsetValueComparer #26678
    community-contribution

Updated

  • Put parentheses around IS NULL for non-bool operands #26653
  • Query: Introduce method for providing brackets around SqlExpression b… #26660

Created

Closed

PullRequests

Created
